document_data.name: The Green Wyvern
document_data.mainbody: '''The Green Wyvern''' was a tavern in [[Suzail]] in [[Cormyr]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Structure: One of the doors at the taproom, often blocked with a [[broom]], hid a ''[[portal]]'' to [[Marsember]]. The ''portal'' was not common knowledge.
document_data.History: At some point after the start of spring in the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, the [[Red Wizard]] [[Harnrim Starangh]] and the [[War Wizard]] [[Huldyl Rauthur]] briefly ''[[teleported]]'' to the tavern, where they knew the [[bard]] and [[Harper]] [[Roldro Tattershar]] spent time. They discussed [[Vangerdahast]]'s latest [[spell]], which was to bind [[dragon]]s to service, so that he "overheard" it. Then they ''teleported'' back out; Roldro quickly used the ''portal'' and left.
